title: Between the wars: the Spanish Civil War
creator_credit: Anthony Potter, Scott Garen, Alan Landsburg Productions and Films Incorporated
brief_description: A balanced account showing how the inadequate response of the great democratic powers - France, Britain and the United States - power politics of Germany and Italy heightened Axis contempt for them and encouraged Axis expansion. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
